plot outline: Vara (Naveen Chandra) is an orphan who works as a valet parking driver and falls in love with a rich girl, Julie (Nivetha Thomas) and wins her love. Happiness goes in vain when Vara finds a briefcase of a criminal named Khan (Abhimanyu Singh) which has all the important secrets. The story goes to the next level when Khan starts chasing Vara. How Vara escapes this chaos forms the rest of the story.
title: Juliet Lover of Idiot
plot: Vara (Naveen Chandra) is an orphan who works as a valet parking driver and falls in love with a rich girl, Julie (Nivetha Thomas) and wins her love.
